2. Process¶

class aleph.process.Process(n_processes, process_id, secret_key, public_key, addresses, public_key_list, tx_receiver_address, userDB=None, tx_source=<function tx_listener>, gossip_strategy='unif_random')¶

This class represents a single member of the committee in the Aleph protocol.

Parameters

  • n_processes (int) – the committee size

  • process_id (int) – the id of the process

  • secret_key (string) – the private key of the current process

  • public_key (string) – the public key of the current process

  • addresses (list) – the list of length n_processes containing addresses (host, port) of all committee members

  • public_keys (list) – the list of public keys of all committee members

  • tx_receiver_address (tuple) – address pair (host, port) on which the process should listen for incoming transactions

  • userDB (object) – initial state of user accounts

  • tx_source (object) – method used for listening for incomming transactions

  • gossip_strategy (string) – name of the gossip strategy to be used by the process

add_unit_and_extend_linear_order(U)¶

Add a (compliant) unit to the poset, try to find a new timing unit and in the case of success, extend the linear order. :param Unit U: the unit to be added to the poset

add_unit_to_poset(U)¶

Checks compliance of the unit U and adds it to the poset (unless already in the poset). Subsequently validates transactions using U. :param Unit U: the unit to be added :returns: boolean value: True if the unit was succesfully added or was already in the poset, False if the unit is not compliant

adjust_create_delay()¶

Looks at the 3 last units created by our process and based on their levels modifies the create_delay.

choose_process_to_sync_with()¶

Choses a process with which to sync using the relevant strategy. :returns: the id of the process chosen

async create_add(txs_queue, server_started)¶

A task that will keep creating new units. :param multiprocessing.Queue txs_queue: a queue of transactions to be added to units :param asyncio.Event server_started: a mutex to ensure that the basic connection server starts before we commence unit creation

create_unit(txs)¶

Attempts to create a new unit in the poset. :param list txs: the transactions to include in the unit :returns: A new unit if creation was successfull, None otherwise

async dispatch_syncs(server_started)¶

A task that will keep initiating syncs with other processes. :param asyncio.Event server_started: an event to ensure that the basic connection server starts before we commence syncing

process_txs_in_unit_list(list_U)¶

For now this just counts the transactions in all the units in list_U. :param list list_U: the list of units containing the transactions to be counted :returns: The number of transactions

async run()¶

A task to run the process.

sign_unit(U)¶

Signs the unit. :param Unit U: the unit to be signed.

async start_listeners(server_started)¶

A task that will start listeners for syncs from other processes. :param asyncio.Event server_started: an event to ensure that the basic connection server starts before we commence syncing
